title: Kain Kepala (headcloth), 1900–71
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Square headcloth (kain kepala) or carrying cloth in red, blue, and cream. Plain red diamond center with white line design at edges and bordered in blue. Diamond surrounded by a red floral vine in on a herringbone ground. Narrow plain outer border in red and outer imitating fringe.
